dmca.title: Going Eye-to-Eye and Bluetooth-to-Bluetooth
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

As you may know, the Bluetooth SIG owns the Bluetooth Trademarks, including the Bluetooth word mark, the Bluetooth combination mark, and the Bluetooth figure mark.  In a recent review of your website, www.bluetoothagainstbush.com, we were concerned to discover that you are inappropriately using the Bluetooth word mark and distorted figure mark, when you are not a Bluetooth Member and your product has not passed the Bluetooth Qualification Process (
